anni.name: Anni
anni.title: Animal Keeper
anni.desc: Anni lives in the city of Kingdom Port, royal and the youngest sister to Asula. While Asula forced into the military, Anni stayed by her love for the animals in the nature. She borrowed two guns from the pirats, and got her animals by her side then she must go serious!

prop.Active:
Anni summon polecats that fighting for you, fetch enemies in the area and dealing physical damage.
As the polecats can't be touched, but affected enemies become slowed while running around they legs.
Anni got power from her family, gain increased Attack Speed, Movement Speed and Physical Power for a short duration.

Anni got sight form the birds, the same second each enemies who got catch by her sight got a peck from a bird. Dealing physical damage to each enemy and debuff they Armor for a short duration.
For a short duration, Anni can see invisible enemies and make catched enemies in her sight become visible while the debuff duration.
Anni sending a bear to a targeted localtion, dealing physical damage to all enemies in the area and stunning them.

aria.name: Aria
aria.title: The Winged Archer
aria.desc: Aria is a angel of light with healing tactics, younger sister to Oone that is the leader of the military by the light angels. Aria fighting for the humans to create balance, with her bow and wings she can cause much damage, but with her healing skills she can also treat the wounded!

prop.Active:
Aria launch a light arrow that piercing through enemies and allies in a line, dealing magic damage to enemies and make them paralyzed.
Heal allies hit in the line.

Aria creates a magical shield around her that absorbing a % of all incoming damage for a short duration. Then this shield ends, it dealing magic damage to enemies around you, heal you and your allies in same size.

Aria flying up and sending her feathers at a targeted area, dealing physical damage and slow all enemies hit.
In the second she fly up, she ignoring all attacks that are not from the sky.
Aria sprinting fast in a line, her next basic attack will do a bonus magic damage. She can do this 3 times before the cooldown after.

blade.name: Blade
blade.title: Master of Blades
blade.desc: Blade lives in the Neutral City of Kings and Queens with a ruth childhood by standing up against her rival, Katana. They both parents died then they were young, then they struggled to live in the big city. She got an experience by using her magic to bend her blades around, with that tactic she create pain by magical power from being hit by her blades, but her Movements aren't like Katanas. By her tactics she make her enemies confused by binding them together with magical force.

prop.Active:
Blade throw all her seven blades in a big line, dealing physical damage each blade hit.
Every hit by your basic attacks decrease this active cooldown by 0,5 seconds.
prop.Passive: Every seventh time she hit an enemy, deal an extra bonus magic damage.

prop.Active:
Blade blink to a nearby localtion, let her critt next hit by her basic attack with an increased critt damage the last 3 seconds.
Every hit by your basic attacks decrease this active cooldown by 0,5 seconds.
prop.Passive:
Blade got increased critt chance, every time she critt, the targeted and hunted enemy take magic damage from a magical pulse.
2,5 seconds cooldown.

prop.Active: Blade force a magical damage to all enemies who are binded to each other, also stunning them.
prop.Passive:
Blade bind her enemies by her basic attacks, hitting two differently enemies bind them together.
Hunted enemies can't run from each other, using a leap away they are pulled back.
prop.Damage: Magic: 40 / 70 / 100 / 130 / 160 (+4 per hero level +80 at lvl 20)

prop.Active: Blade increases her Attack Speed and letting her blades seek to the nearest hunted enemy.

chantrea.name: Chantrea
chantrea.title: Huntress of The Moon
chantrea.desc: Chantrea is an elven princess in City of Forest, leader in the hunt, and skilled with her magic used by the energy of the moon. Her wisest guide is Grey Wonder who learned her the moon energy, letting her arrows seek to enemies.

prop.Active: Chantrea creating a beam from the sky as a moon light, dealing magic damage and stunning all enemies in the targeted localtion.
Chantreas next three arrows piercing through enemies in a line, at the end of the line, they start to seek to the nearest target.
prop.Passive:
Her arrows start to seeking to your target nearby if you miss, but just a % of your damage.
Critt cause an extra true damage from a % of your magic power and seeking to an other enemy target nearby.

prop.Active:
Chantrea whistling on her pet, dash forward while riding on it, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and pulling they back.
In a duration, she got increased movement speed and ignoring slow and fear effects.
Chantrea targeting one enemy in a long sight, waiting for 2,5 seconds then aim, dealing physical damage to the first enemy hero hit.

clear.name: Clear
clear.title: The Bloody Cowboy
clear.desc: Clear is a cowboy in City of Desert, doesn't have family or siblings. She works alone and always been alone and have always trying to hunting down the roge broders Razor and Rexas! She is the best fighter with a whip by her movements and strength, letting her whip destroy her opponents ribs and letting they bleed.

prop.Active: Clear strike with her whip in a line, dealing physical damage, let them bleed and they take a % more damage from physical in the bleed duration.
prop.Passive: Basic attacks now mark her enemies, dealing 2% more damage every stuck. (max 10%)

prop.Active:
Clear catch the first enemy, turrent or tree in a line.
Turrents & Trees let you in the same second leap to it.
Enemy become rooted while you can't attack, but let you leap to a localtion of three points around the enemy target in 1,5 seconds time.
After your leap, your next basic attack will do a % extra physical damage.
Clear wheel forward, dealing physical damage to all enemies from behind and pushing they back.
Clear pushes back all enemies in a area around her, make them bleed and slow them over time.

dwarlin.name: Dwarlin
dwarlin.title: The Beast Hunter
dwarlin.desc: Dwarlin lives in Winterfall, friend to Storm but always start a fight agenst Tumblr. His axes got a enchantment to create shock pulses that he has learne to use, also created a habit to overloading the magical force that make him impossible to fight agenst.

prop.Active: Dwarlin throw both of his axes, piercing though enemies in the line, dealing physical damage.
prop.Passive:
The third hit at a target make a bloody effect.
Bloody Effect: Slow your enemy while they are bleeding.

prop.Active:
Dwarlin sets a trap at the target location that arms after 1.1 seconds and lasts up to 90. After the maximum amount of traps is laid down, deploying another immediately destroys the oldest one.
Enemy champions who step on a trap set it off, rooting them for 1s and make they bleed over 3s while they are slowed and in same time they armor is destroyed.

Dwarlin throwing an axe at the target localtion, the axe starts to chock enemies in the area, dealing magic damage.
Can be throwed two at once before the cooldown.

Dwarlin starts to spark over his whole body, his basic attacks and Duble Axes got a bonus magic damage and stunning his targets.
Stun effect can only effect the same enemy once per 2,5 seconds.

elany.name: Elany
elany.title: The Fairy Archer
elany.desc: Elany is a fairy in the magical forest The Dark Forest. Learned how to greate her self in a bigger size to fight for the elven. Her experience by fairy magic and fighting with a elven bow make her a big threat.

prop.Active: Elany fires an arrow up to the sky, a flaming bolt strike at the targeted localtion, dealing magic damage to all enemies in the area.
prop.Empowered: 10 more flaming bolts are aming nearby the targeted localtion in 10 other targeted localtions. Fireflies do a double damage this time.
prop.Damage: Magic: 10 / 40 / 70 / 100 / 130 (+100% Magic Power) (+2 per hero level = 40)

prop.Active: Elany become a small fairy, increases her movement speed and ignoring skill effects, but can't attack or do skills and don't ignoring damage from skills with size.
prop.Passive: Elanys basic attacks got a bonus magic damage.
prop.Empowered: Elany starts to heal in fairy form.

prop.Active:
Elany confuse enemy heroes in a local area for a short duration, effected minions have a chance to fight the nearest enemy for a longer duration.
Effected enemies got a bonus magic damage from your first arrow hit the last 3.5 seconds.
prop.Empowered: In the blossom circle, make your enemy heroes as a prisoner for 3,5 secodns, they can't go or dash or leap out from the circle.

prop.Active: Elany empowers her next ability cast within the next 8 seconds, adding an additional effect.
prop.Passive: Elany got increased magic power.

frank.name: Frank
frank.title: The Alchemist
frank.desc: Frank own The Library Tower and got a own labb under his office where he experiments with the experimental rats, and other animals, He doesn't has experience by using magic, but his own working poisons makes him more excited in fights with his crossbow.

prop.Active: Frank throw a poison at a target localtion, affect all enemies with poisen, dealing true magic damage per seconds over a time.

Frank throw a poison at a target localtion, randomly affects enemies by Confusion, Contrarwise, Charm or Mesmerize over a duration. All enemies got randomly affects, but monsters just got confused and decreased Armor.
Active again he switch poison to give allies in a target localtion mana and magic protection.
Frank drink a poison, increases his power and attack speed over a time.
Frank throw a poison at a target localtion, blast the area and dealing physical damage to all enemies hit.
prop.Passive: Frank go in stealth mode after 5 seconds if out of combat.

lancel.name: Lancel
lancel.title: The Longest Sight
lancel.desc: Lancel live in the small villages outside the Neutral City of Kings and Queens, with a ruth life, he struggled and helped the poor people, but taking from the rich. With his great long bow and easy movable body he got the longest shot and is great in fights!

prop.Active: Lancel fires multi of arrows in a cone with long size front of you, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit.
Lancel performs a slide in a direction he is currently traveling, increases his attack speed for a short duration after he slide.

Lancel fires an arrow bound to a rope. The first enemy hero hit, they become binded to you for a short duration. Silence they movement tactics and slowing them.
Dealing physical damage to the enemy hero hit.
prop.Passive:
Successful hitting enemies with his basic attacks, Lancel got a increased range with both his tactics and his basic attacks.
Ends then he out of combat in 5 seconds.

prop.Active:
Lancel aming for the sky, every second his sight increases and you can launch at a localtion much far away, dealing physical damage in the targeted area Lancel launch his cone of arrows at, increases the damage done till the maximum size.
Become interupted from taking harm in this stance.

leo.name: Leo
leo.title: The Fire Archer
leo.desc: Leo lives in City of Mordune together with Fenrir, leader of the offencive squad in the military. With her fire power as magic, her Bow tactics are incredibly dangerous to the enemies in fights.

prop.Active: Leo fires a flaming arrow at the first enemy hit in a long range, dealing physical damage and an extra magic damage to enemies effected by the fire ravens.
Leo jumps away from your localtion, fires a burning flame at the localtion she escaped from, dealing magic  damage instant to the enemies in the area.

Leo fires a fire raven that burning enemies in a line, split up to three fire ravens that start to search for three enemies nearby, can stuck to same enemy and do more damage.
Dealing magic damage to burned enemies and fire ravens burn they target and can stuck up to three ravens at the same target.
Leo turns on the bow to the sides, sending a burning wave of wings, dealing physical damage to all enemies it fly through. Reaches quite far.

lucifer.name: Lucifer
lucifer.title: Life Taker
lucifer.desc: Lucifer is a vampire and living with his brothers and sister in the Abandoned Castle, he aren't just skilled with his bow and hunting skills, he can also taking life and create pain to his enemies. With both healing him self and dealing incredible damage, he become a dangerous vampire.

prop.Active: Lucifer launch a magical arrow, dealing magic damage with a bonus damage of they vurrent health and healing him self by a % of it.
prop.Passive: Enemies hit by Lucifer's arrows cause a blood drop with a maximum of 5 blood drops. Each blood drop let Bloody Hell deal a bonus magic damage to the enemies effected and heal him by the half amount of the bonus magic damage.
prop.Blood Drop: Magic: 40 (+2 per hero level = 80 at level 20)

prop.Active: Lucifer taking out health from enemies in the area, dealing true magic damage from a % of they maximum health.
Lucifer take a % of his own health, to increases his physical power for a short duration.

Lucifer launch a magical root that roots the first enemy hit, extending slowly to nearby enemies. Touching other enemies they will take the same pain as the targeted enemy, deamling magic damage and a true magic damage of a % of they maximum health while they entangled.

mei.name: Mei
mei.title: The Ice Cold Pirate
mei.desc: Mei is a pirate living in Kingdom Port, took over her faders place by becom captain of the pirates. She got the best enchantress with her with name Melody, and have always trying to catch the sea queen Ashera. Because of her ice magic, she can freeze her enemies, create incredible walls of ice and freeze the water as well, letting her walk on the sea as if she own it!

prop.Active: Mei shattering her loaded cristal, creates a cone of icicles front of her, chill and dealing physical damage to all enemies hit.
prop.Passive: Killing a minion creates a cone of icicles behind the killed minion and hit enemies in the cone, dealing physical damage and chill them, double effect if killing enemy hero.

prop.Active:
Mei creates a frozen wall to stop enemies, active again or after the duration ends, the wall explode to icicles in a area around the wall, dealing physical damage to each enemy hit and create the same chill effects as Splittering Cristal.
Active again before doing the skill, change the angle.

Mei spraying cold frost in a line, channeling while moving. Dealing physical damage to the enemy hit per second.
Freeze the enemy in a certain time and double effect to chilled enemies.

Mei creates a cristal that chilling all enemies in a area and dealing physical damage per seconds, freeze enemies at last.
Double effect to chilled enemies.

phia.name: Phia
phia.title: The Deserted Bounty Hunter
phia.desc: Phia lives in the City of Desert as a bounty hunter, playing as a bandit self but lives to catch all the other bandits. Do always race by catching the bandits before the cowboy, Clear arrives. With her bola, bombs and her special crossbow she is prepared for fighting!

prop.Active: Phia throwing a bola at the first enemy hit in a line. Slowing the enemy before it's detonation, dealing physical damage to all enemies around the target.
Phia fires three arrows that piercing through enemies in a line, dealing physical damage to enemies hit.

Phia lay a sentry on a targeted localtion, start to fire arrows at targeted enemies. Lasts up to 25 seconds. After the maximum amount of traps is laid down, deploying another immediately destroys the oldest one.
Phia lay a ticking bomb on a targeted localtion, dealing physical damage to all enemies in the area around the bomb after the detonation.

raven.name: Raven
raven.title: The Silent Archer
raven.desc: Raven lives in the Abandoned City, found as just a child helpless without parents, was raised by the vampire Lucifer, now lives with her ravens as her name as well, and taking care of Sabrine as if she was her little sister. She fighting in silence as a hunter and can some magical tactics. She are to strong too be just a ordinary human!

prop.Active: Raven fires a dark arrow that piercing through enemies in a line, dealing magic damage and destroy they defence for a long duration.
Raven cause a magical force on a area, silence the enemies and dealing magic damage to them.

Raven leap to a localtion invisible.
Silent Strike: Her next basic attack silence the enemy and dealing a bonus magic damage, can't be silences for 3 seconds cooldown after Silent Strike, same to Silent Strike.

Raven summons her friends that targeting enemies inside the area, dealing physical damage over a duration.
Effected enemies can't go stright and they are slowed.

richard.name: Richard
richard.title: The Arcane Archer
richard.desc: Richard lives in City of Mordune, engaged with Riley.

prop.Active:
Richard fires five bolts at random enemies, dealing magic damage each bolt.
Can crit.
prop.Passive: Basic attacks got a % of his magic power, he also got increased magic power.

prop.Active: Richard sending three arcane pixies that ensnare the first enemy hit by a prison, dealing magic damage.
prop.Item: Create a shield that deflect the first magical tactic on you, increases your mana and your Magic Power as well.
prop.Damage: Magic: 80 / 100 / 120 / 140 / 160 (+20% of ability power) (+1% bonus mana)

prop.Active:
Richard teleport to a localtion, silence enemies in the targeted area and dealing magic damage to them.
Reduction 50% cooldown for Arcane Bolts.
Richard sending a % of his mana to an increadible arrow, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line.

Rogue throwing a boomerang like a half moon, stunning enemies hit and dealing physical damage.
Active twise, she throwing the boomerang in a line instead, dealing half of the physical damage, but teleport to it's end. Double damage to minions and monsters.
Rogue play a sound from her fluet, increases her and her allies attack speed for a long duration.
prop.Passive: Now you see footsteps from enemies 5 seconds behind and you both hear nearby enemies footsteps and can see a red arrow at what direction you hearing them.

prop.Active:
Rogue leap to a targeted localtion, dealing physical damage to all enemies in the area, decreases they defence for a short duration.
Bow: Rogue launch arrows at a targeted localtion, slows and dealing physical damage to enemies.

Rogue switch to her bow, increases her Armor Penetration while she holding her bow.
While she has her dagger, increases her crit chance and crit damage with a bloody effect.

simin.name: Simin
simin.title: Demon Hunter
simin.desc: Simin lives in Mordune, always fighting side by side with Diode and Tigra, But often in search after demons and vampire like a phantom, while Diode and Tigra stay in the kingdom for the protection in the military and the royal family.

prop.Active: Simin fires an arrow that piercing through enemies in a line, dealing piercing damage.

Simin launch an arrow at a targeted localtion, dealing physical damage to all enemies in that small area.
Can't fires in a short range, but have increased sight.
prop.Passive:
Basic attacks from Simins arrows effecting your enemies with a poison from toxic silver, dealing physical damage over time.
Effected enemies can't become invisible and let you see them in a longer range.

prop.Active:
Simin launch an arrow that explode on your target, creates sharp pieces as a cone, dealing physical damage to the targeted enemy and an other damage to they behind.
Enemies hit by the projectiles also got the toxic.

Samin launch a great arrow in a line, the first enemy hit got pushed back, dealing physical damage to the target and an other damage to all enemies the pushed enemy hit and also knock they back too.
If the target hit a wall, turrent or a tree they be stunned.

snow.name: Snow
snow.title: The Bounty Hunter
snow.desc: Snow lives in Winterfall, lives to catch all bounties.

prop.Active:
Snow fires an arrow at the first enemy hit, detornate after 1,5 seconds after hit an enemy, dealing physical damage and can crit.
In crit, the detonate dealing true damage.
Snow fires metal stars that piercing through enemies in a cone, dealing physical damage and make them bleed and become slowed while bleeding.
Snow jump over things he get close to, increases his movement speed and attack speed a short duration.

Snow targeting a nearby tree, turrent, building or other high things, ignoring all harming or effects and let your Stars fire at a ground target, Bounty Bomb also hit a ground target, detonate and dealing half of it's physical damage as true damage to all enemies in the targeted area.
Leaves make you jump to a targeted localtion.
prop.Passive: Snow got increased crit damage.

spiro.name: Spiro
spiro.title: The Spirit Seeker
spiro.desc: Spiro is a elven who lives in City of Forest, big brother to Chantrea, but chose the spiritual power front of the royal duty. Chantrea got the moon power, but Spiro developed a spiritual power from the inner him created by spiritual energy from the nature.

prop.Active: Spiro launch an arrow to a targeted localtion while vault to the direction he goes, dealing physical damage to all enemies in the small area from a spiritual field created by the arrow that also slowing them.

Spiro summons a spirit that searching for enemies, floating around in the targeted localtion for 30 seconds and sense stealthed enemies. Dealing physical damage and slowing the targeted enemy it find.
This spirit is invisible to it catch one enemy and can just catch same enemy each spirit.
Spiro detonate the power of his spiritual arrows stack at enemies, dealing physical damage to all enemies stack by arrows and become slowed.
prop.Passive: All basic attacks stacking at enemies body.

prop.Active: Spiro take his life for every arrow launched, but he got increased Physical Power and every basic attack, a spiritual nova is created and dealing physical damage to all closed enemies.
prop.Passive: Spiro got increased Life steal.

tumblr.name: Tumblr
tumblr.title: The Shielded Huntress
tumblr.desc: Tumblr lives in Winterfall, loving then Dwarlin always pick a fight agenst her, sees him like a little brother of his size. She's like a great viking, with her tactics with her shield and spear she is increadible in fights!

prop.Active: Tumblrs next four basic attacks got an increased attack speed and the spears got armor penetration.
Tumblr shield her self and block a % of all incoming damage at her front for a short duration.
prop.Passive: She got a block chance agenst projectiles, block 80% of the damage.

prop.Active:
Tumblr throw her spear at a targeted localtion, dealing physical damage to all enemies in the area and slowing them.
Taking this up decreases the cooldown of this skill.

Tumblr increases her and her allies movement speed for a long duration.
In the duration, her Four Spears got a increased attack speed.

anders.name: Anders
anders.title: The Spirit Torturer
anders.desc: Anders lives in Mordune, right hand to the king and working to get the truth from the criminals. He's a perfect spirit user, creating spiritual weapons to catch or pierce enemies body just to hurt or torture enemies.

prop.Active:
Anders strike enemies with a spiritual hammer that crushing they spirit, dealing magic damage and slowing them.
Strike at three different stances. In a line, in a cone or in a area.
In an area, Anders creates four spiritual swords that strike all at once, dealing magic damage and slowing them.

Anders catch the first enemy hero hit in a line, dealing physical damage and slowing they.
Ending if they escape the maximum size.

Anders catch all enemies in a big size around him, if they stay inside the size, they become pulled to him after 2,5 seconds, dealing physical damage to pulled enemies, but before the pull, they become slowed.
He can walk while he chained them, but become stunned for 0,5 seconds after pulling them.

asula.name: Asula
asula.title: Full Armored Princess
asula.desc: Princess Asula lives in the city of Kingdom Port, the oldest sister by Anni, Aenna and cousin to Diode from City of Mordune. Asula is inherited the throne, she is the captain by the military forces, side by side with Tna and they healer Malin. With her magical powers increases her tactics in the fights.

prop.Active:
Asula sending a magical energy from her sword, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit in a line. It also catch the last enemy hero hit, let her dash to the targeted hero and stunning all enemies in the way by her shield and pull them away a bit.
Stunned enemies taking a bonus damage from your armor.
Asula increases her and her allies physical and magic power for a short duration.

Asula creates a magical mirror on her shield, creates a destructive armor front of her.
The first ability projectile that hit the mirror, sends back and this mirror will end.
Asula gain power from the angels, heal her and her allies around her per second and increases they and her magic protection for the healing duration.

diana.name: Diana
diana.title: Cleric of The Sun
diana.desc: Diana lives in the holy church in City of Kingdom Port, best friend to Ania, Pius and Malin. She also is a cleric that believes in the goddes of the sun, blinding enemies and burning them with her spear by holy magic.

prop.Active: Diana throwing a spear of flames, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit in a line.

Diana creates a magical shield around her, absorbing all sorts of attacks the following duration.
The end of the duration, the shield expires and creating a nova that dealing magic damage to all enemies in a area. A % of all absorbing damage, increases this nova damage.
Diana blindes enemies with her shield in a cone for 1 second, decreases they protection for a short duration and they can't move stright.
Diana sending a light from the sky, stunning enemies hit for 1 second in the targeted localtion and dealing magic damage.

diode.name: Diode
diode.title: The Crusader
diode.desc: Diode lives in the City of Mordune, cousin to princess Asula in Kingdom Port, rival to the shield master Rebecca in Neutral City of Kings and Queens, lives as a crusaider and also is a believer. Crushing enemies with her mace and always are good with her shouting voice to taunting enemies!

prop.Active: Diode strike with her mace increased by god power, dealing physical damage to all enemies in a cone and destroying they armor for a short duration.
Diode taunt all enemies around her, give her a bonus destructive armor per enemy taunted.
prop.Passive:
Diode got a buff called Revansh, increases the damage to her next strike with Mace Swing.
The buff stacks every time she take damage.

prop.Active:
Diode trap enemies inside a circle with swords circulating the area, dealing physical damage per second to enemies inside the area.
Enemies can't go out or in to/from the area.

Diode be lift by an angel, after lock a target location, she strike at the area, stunning enemies and dealing physical damage.
Diode can't be attacked then she up on the sky.

dracula.name: Dracula
dracula.title: Vampire Lord
dracula.desc: Dracula lives in the Abandoned Castle, oldest by the sister and brothers, and also the leader of the vampires. He got a blade and his gigantic shield by a head of the king of the bats in the demon world, because of his gigantic body and wings he can be kind of dangerous by also ignoring he got pain.

prop.Active: Dracula strike all enemies in a cone front of him with a gigantic bite, dealing physical damage and heal him a % of all the damage from each enemy. Enemies hit become slowed for a short duration.

Dracula kick one enemy away in a line, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit and slow the target.
Double effect from minions and also slow the targets the minion hit with duble effect.
Dracula leaps to a target localtion, dealing physical damage to all enemies in the area and also slow them down.
Dracula laugh and fear all enemies around him, dealing physical damage per ,25 seconds who is catch by his fear.

elise.name: Elise
elise.title: Frozen Armored
elise.desc: Elise lives in City of Ice, right hand to princess Emiza and like her sister, found helpless in a cave and taken care of by the royal family. Now she working in the military defences, carrying on a self-built armor, hammer and shield. Her strong attacks and the force of ice magic makes her harmless to kill!

prop.Active: Elise dash to the first enemy hit, strike with her hammer and dealing physical damage to the target and smash them up the the sky.

Elise creates cristals on her armor, give her a destructive armor.
After the armor destroys, it shattering icicles around her, dealing physical damage to all enemies nearby, or she can just active again to shattering the icicles by her self.

Elise smash her hammer at the ground, creates a line of cristals, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit by the field in the line and slowing them.
Enemies that are flying up to the sky and landing on this field of cristals, they taking an increased damage.

Elise smash her hammer at the ground again, but now make her enemies stumble down at the ground, dealing physical damage and creates a icy field.
Dealing physical damage per cristal enemies walk over and slowed on the field.

fenrir.name: Fenrir
fenrir.title: Armored Pheonix
fenrir.desc: Fenrir lives in City of Mordune together with Leo, leader of the deffencive squad in the military. With his mace and fire power as magic, he can run and not to bother if he got any harm, he just continues burning his enemies!

prop.Active: Fenrir start to burn all enemies in a cone for 3 seconds, dealing magic damage per seconds.
prop.Passive: Every third strike with his mace burst a breath, burn enemies in a cone with an instant damage.

prop.Active: Fenrir start to burn the ground he walk over, creates a trail behind him that burn enemies per second who walking over the trail.

Fenrir creates a fall of flame that affecting all enemies that walking through it by burn, dealing magic damage per second.
Enemies standing in wall of flame are burning, dealing XX magic damage per second. Leaving wall of flame deals XX magic damage over 3 seconds. Active again before doing the skill, change the angle.

Fenrir create a burning skin that burning enemies near him, dealing magic damage per second.
If he dies with this active, he resurrect with just 30% of his maximum health.
prop.Passive: Fenrir got an increased Health Regen and Magic Protection.

golem.name: Golem
golem.title: The Lonely Soul
golem.desc: Golem lives self in the mountains, scare away people who walks through the mountain path. He is a lonely soul with no friends and doesn't know his background and how he came to, he is just a big rock with thoughts and feelings that crush enemies he sees.

prop.Active:
Golem smash at the ground, dealing physical damage to all enemies front of him in a line and slowing them for 2 seconds.
Can be active again to smash the ground but dealing physical damage to all enemies around him in a small area, giving him a buff of streangth.
Golem give him an his allies around him a destructive armor for 10 seconds.
prop.Passive:
Golem got a destructive armor after 5 seconds out of combat.
Golem also got a thorn from his armor and 30% of his Armor increases his Physical Power included his destructive armor.

prop.Active: Golem leap to a target localtion, dealing physical damage to all enemies and smash them up to the sky.

Golem starts to channel, crating a strong burst of a instant earthquake as a nova. After 2,5 seconds he dealing physical damage to all enemies in the area around him.
While channel, he slowing enemies in the targeted area around him.

oone.name: Oone
oone.title: The Angel Master
oone.desc: Oone is a arc angel of light with healing tactics, leader of the military by the light angels. older brother to Aria, and the best swordsman in the world!

prop.Active: Oone swing his mighty sword, dealing physical damage and stealing they protection for a short duration.
prop.Passive: Enemy hit by this sword stacking up his physical power to he is out of vombat for 10 seconds (max 20 stacks)

prop.Active: Oone flying up and fast leap to a target localtion, pulling enemies up to the air, increases his movement speed & attack spoeed for a short duration.
Oone heal him and his allies around him instantly, 10% more per stack from Mighty Sword but end all the stacks.
Oone dash forward and strike all enemies in the line with his sword, dealing physical damage and stacking his mighty sword per enemy hit with a duble affect.

pius.name: Pius
pius.title: Fighter for Justice
pius.desc: Pius lives in the holy church in City of Kingdom Port, best friend to Ania, Diana and Malin. He also is a paladin, fighting for justice and destroy all evil in the world by his hammer and blessed powers.

prop.Active:
Pius sending a magical hammer in a line to the first hero hit, dealing magic damage and stunning the target.
Also dealing magic damage to all enemies in the line before hitting a hero.
prop.Passive: Pius got increased power to his basic attacks and a % bonus magic damage by his power.

prop.Active:
Pius creates a shield that deflect all incoming damage for a short duration.
Also got a aura that increases his and his allies Armor after the shield end for a longer duration.
Pius sending a light of holy at a target localtion, heal and give armor to allies, but dealing magic damage to enemies hit by this light.
Pius debuff all enemies in a target localtion, decreasing they power and protection for a short duration.

rebecca.name: Rebecca
rebecca.title: The Shield Master
rebecca.desc: Rebecca lives in Neutral City of Kings and Queens, always fighting for skills and dreaming of a pieceful world, also rival to the crusaider Diode. She is also the greatest shield master in the world, fighting with it like it was her right hand like a main weapon as her mace.

prop.Active: Rebecca bash all enemies front of her with her shield, dealing physical damage and stunning them.
prop.Passive: Rebecca got a chance to bash her target with her basic attack, dealing a % increased damage of her physical power and stunning them.

prop.Active:
Rebecca throw her shield in a line, dealing physical damage to the first enemy hit and start to bounce up to 5 enemies in a 30 radius.
While the shield is bouncing, she can't do Bash, Shield Rush or other shield item skills the following seconds.
Rebecca rush forward, push back all enemies and dealing physical damage to them.

Rebecca start to ignore 30% of all physical damage agenst her, blocking all piercing projectiles for harming allies from behind.
She also got increased damage to her shield skills.

tana.name: Tna
tana.title: Girl of Justice
tana.desc: Tna lives in City of Kindom Port, believe in justice and fight side by side with princess Asula. From living in the streets, she climbed quite high in order to reach its goal. Now with her golden whip and sword she clearing the city from crimes.

prop.Active:
Tna dash trough all enemies in a line, dealing physical damage to all enemies addition 25% of an amount between your maximum health and the enemies maximum health as true damage.
Basic attacks decreases this cooldown by 0,5 seconds and counting on all enemy hits by Sword of Justice.
prop.True Damage: True: +25% Between they Maximum Health (250 Maximum Damage)

prop.Active:
Tna throw her sword, piercing through enemies in a line and dealing physical damage both forward and back to Tna.
Loosing her basic attack, but left click and the sword coming back.

Tna catch the first enemy hero hit, decrease they physical power and movement speed while they caught.
Her next basic attack at this target hero do an extra true damage from 15% of her maximum health.
Tna leap to a localtion and cause a increadible physical damage to all enemies in the target localtion.
Tank breathe out deadly souls in a cone, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit. Kill enemy hit heal him 12% of they maximum health.
prop.Passive:
He got a bonus magic damage from a % by his magic protection.
Killing enemies give him permanent health and also heal after killing. Double effect from killing heroes.

prop.Active:
Tank throw his sword at a target localtion, dealing physical damage to all enemies and slowing them.
Enemies with 30% health or less got killed, giving him the permanent health buff. Attacking makes the sword fall back to your hand,
Tank rush forward, strike all enemies in the line and sending them up to the air, dealing physical damage.
Tank burst out souls in a area around him, dealing magic damage and slowing them.

lilith.name: Lilith
lilith.title: The Current Mother of all Demons
